Installation¶

Requirements¶

You need to have the following software properly installed in order to run TEN:

  • A working MPI implementation, preferably supporting MPI-3 and built with shared/dynamic libraries.
  • Python 2.6, 2.7, 3.2 or above.
  • Numpy
  • MPI4py

And for the tools of post processing:

  • Matplotlib

Using pip¶

We are working in this.
